website_summaries.verdict: A feather-light cream that’s good for oily and combination skin.
pros: The milky liquid-like cream is easy to apply and absorbs quickly
It helps to control excess sebum, leaving a matte finish to skin and can be used as a primer under foundation
It doesn't feel greasy and is long-lasting
cons: It would be useful if it came in a bigger size since it runs out quickly with everyday use

customer_reviews.title: Very small container.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product but the container is very, very small. I’m wondering how long this will last.
customer_reviews.author: nikki baker

customer_reviews.title: Non sticky light and feels great on face
customer_reviews.text: Really love this moisturizer, it does feels light and very absorb to my skin. It doesn't have any sticky feel like most spf moisturizer does but yet it does it jobs. I feel like my skin is drinking the moisturizer so well. Smooth and silky. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: I love this Sunblock
customer_reviews.text: I love this Sunblock. No nasty sunblock smell, and its light and my skin absorbs it well. I'm not in the sun too much though. Only on my commutes from my house to work and back pretty much. I use it only in the morning after my other facial routines (toner, lotion, creams), before applying any makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Juli Kyun

customer_reviews.title: light and oil-free
customer_reviews.text: I do not like sticky, heavy sunscreens so this was perfect. It's also the perfect travel size. It goes on without leaving your face white or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: While this sunscreen is rather expensive I keep going back to it. I hate the sticky, white formulas of most sunscreens I've tried. Almost every single sunscreen I have tried makes the makeup I put on over it look terrible. This sunscreen dries quickly, isn't sticky and doesn't leave a white, chalky appearance. I haven't gotten sunburned using it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Freudenmann

customer_reviews.title: Missing safety seals.
customer_reviews.text: Returned the item as product seals were missing. At a time during Covid, you would expect the product to have all the safety seals in place for a topical product.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: ... you add sun screen to the mix it becomes super oily skin but not so much with this
customer_reviews.text: I have really oily skin and then when you add sun screen to the mix it becomes super oily skin but not so much with this. It leaves my skin looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharaz Khan

customer_reviews.title: lots of problems
customer_reviews.text: no expiration date box worn QR code is very blur and can not be read. under the QR little paper ,the surface being scratched badly. maybe for getting rid of the old QR code?
customer_reviews.author: S R

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido is always a good product
customer_reviews.text: This UV protector is very good, easy to apply and best of all it does not remain white on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Lotion is leaking out
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The box is damaged. Lotion has been leaking out. The box looks oily and dirty. Can’t fine expiration date. Won’t buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: The best sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Fast absorbing, I barely notice it's there, and it lasts like a month or longer!
customer_reviews.author: llyybbss

customer_reviews.title: Needed item
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and I have been using it for few years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best sunscreen ever!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best! Very light, not greasy, and the best part - it works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fav sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen, it goes on matte and doesn't feel greasy. I wear it every day and it works well under my makeup. It does have a white tint to it but that has never bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. No shine under make up. It makes a wonderful primer. I wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: chelli barnett

customer_reviews.title: Expensive product
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this item. $32 on a one ounce bottle is a rip off. It’s pretty much a travel size container. You’re better off with buying the Anessa which is $36 and over 3 oz.
customer_reviews.author: LyrehC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's the only sunscreen that is really light on my skin and doesn't make me break out
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Very good protector!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good case, is very fluid, nothing greasy and spreads very well in the face; the only problem is that it seems expensive for the amount it brings.
customer_reviews.author: Karla C.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product, does a good job
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product, does a good job! It's quite small, but that is exactly what I wanted so I'm 100% happy!
customer_reviews.author: TexasSuz

customer_reviews.title: The best UV Protector I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I'm normal and combination skin, this UV Protector fits me well.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: You're not gonna regret buying this!
customer_reviews.text: Small but worth it! Will definitely buy another one soon
customer_reviews.author: Xeena

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, Supple Skin
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't go a day without this. Gives skin a smooth, supple sheen while protecting it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen K.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable on my face, not too white, not oily
customer_reviews.author: Toyama Kazuha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the face and for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Non greasy. Perfect for the face and for oily skin. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: C. Chen

customer_reviews.title: It is leaking everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I got this product today like this condition is leaking everywhere in the box and bottle
customer_reviews.author: Navjot

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: High SPF sunscreen that does not irritate my face ( a rarity!)
customer_reviews.author: My opinion

customer_reviews.title: feels good enough for every day
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a light feeling face sunscreen that works, feels good enough for every day, and does not brake my face out. After several tries, this is the winner. I wear it under my makeup for added SPF and just opened my 3 rd bottle. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: jamie pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Its a small product but the texture is great because it's not greasy and you feel you skin soft. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Meet my expectation, although i havent used it, i hope its real. if its real, the price is good, would order it again. FAST SHIPPING.
customer_reviews.author: Rong Rong Yu

customer_reviews.title: and this one is absolutely the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried tons of sunscreen, and this one is absolutely the best!!! Have bought at least 5 of this one
customer_reviews.author: Ran Z.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bottle
customer_reviews.text: This product is only 1oz (30ml) and cost $30. I thought I was buying a larger size. This is a rip off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  No Smell!  No Oil Feel!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this stuff! It has absolutely no smell or oily feel to it, in fact I believe it almost absorbs oil. It is very thin and liquid. When first applied there is a slight whitish cast that quickly goes away (10 min). I have read of others objecting to that aspect and wonder if darker or more olive color skin reflect the product differently? I am fair in complexion with rosier cheeks, but I do have tons of freckles. At any rate, since discovering this I never leave the house anymore without applying sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Krenek

customer_reviews.title: The only sun screen I have used that is not oily in any way.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sun screen I have used that is not oily in any way, and I like that. Even sun screens that claim they have no oils, still seem to have something in them that appears and feels oily to me. A bit expensive so I only wear it when I want my makeup to look good for a long time. Otherwise, I use a cheaper "oil free" product especially when I'm not wearing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Marie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Facial Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both love this Shiseido oil free facial sunscreen, it's become the only one we use. It has a very light weight texture that goes on like a moisturizer and is not sticky or thick like most other sunscreens. It's so light I can wear it under make up and not feel I'm wearing anything. It's been very effective sun protection for us. It's a bit pricey, but worth it. Amazon sells it for less than I pay elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: DJ.NY

customer_reviews.title: Expired item!See pic!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!Amazon send me the expired item ! Expired two years ago! What the H !
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: light sunscreen and protects
customer_reviews.text: the best it after tested many sunscreen, my glasses don't stain, it makes my skin breathe. My wife and me love it
customer_reviews.author: CetGon

customer_reviews.title: The Shiseido sunblock is light and amazing for an oily skin
customer_reviews.text: For those of you have an oily skin and find sun blocks tough to use, this is the answer. The Shiseido sunblock is light and amazing for an oily skin. I can use it even in 45 degree celcius without being uncomfortable, which most other sun blocks make me. It has the added advantage of giving this subtle glow to the skin. A definite must have for those with an oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: seema

customer_reviews.title: I suspect its authenticity
customer_reviews.text: The cream quality went down tremendously only after using it occationally for a month and keeping it dry cool place, verydissapointed!!
customer_reviews.author: TimEllie

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a shiseido costumer, I love every product, but this one in particular I use it everyday. I love it because is oil free so it doesn't affect my skin, which has a little acne, and protects me well from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Hany Tifa

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It does give off a slightly whiteish tint that eventually absorbs into the skin. Leaves my skin feeling smooth, not greasy. Id buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Catchtanya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best sunscreen ever, sheer and smooth, great for oily skin like mine
customer_reviews.author: valeria

customer_reviews.title: good product and works great
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I thought - I should have checked the size. Either way, good product and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Team Ping

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face sunscreen so far
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen - very light weight, smells great , not oily at all
customer_reviews.author: elisa whitney

customer_reviews.title: Best face sunblock ever
customer_reviews.text: Best face sunblock ever. It smells great, it is quickly absorbed my your skin, not oily at all and a little drop is more than enough for the face. I even use under makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Alenc

customer_reviews.title: Opened box
customer_reviews.text: The package came in like this. It seems someone opened and used it, but don’t like it then put it back to the box. I would like to have my money back
customer_reviews.author: TBKT

customer_reviews.title: Scent too strong
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this sunscreen is like an elderly woman's perfume, and the consistency was a bit thicker than water.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply product which I love
customer_reviews.text: I wear this daily under makeup to protect my face from the sun in Florida. Works perfectly. It is a very lightweight, easy to apply product which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Snickerino

customer_reviews.title: The reason I like this sunscreen because it's very light
customer_reviews.text: The reason I like this sunscreen because it's very light . Still a little bit oily but a better choice from what I already tried before .
customer_reviews.author: Olesya Budim

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return it!
customer_reviews.text: so expensive and leaves your face with a white tint. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for daily use. Haven't tried for beach or outdoor sports
customer_reviews.author: Sunnny

customer_reviews.title: Best facial sunblock
customer_reviews.text: This is as good as it gets for facial sunblock. It's very light, non-oily, and protects well. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Bernie C.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, I received a tiny bottle. Left a terrible white cast on my skin. Not easy to apply. Wouldn't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zohra O'Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived without any tamper seal and the packaging had been crushed. It also had multiple barcode stickers that had been stuck on top of one another, suggesting that it had previously been returned. I'm not convinced that I received a new, full bottle of this product. Very unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: Schnaupal

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I'm still looking for an awesome daily sunscreen for my face but for now this one will do. The price isn't bad and it doesn't cause me to break out which is apparently not very hard with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: JEP

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Counteracts the shine that my BB cream produces. Product is liquid so it's extremely light on your face. A dream to apply and you don't feel like you're wearing sunscreen at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for me. And I like it because it is made in U.S. (not Japan).
customer_reviews.author: Su Ran Kim

product_meta.title: Shiseido Urban Environment Oil-free UV Protector SPF 42 Broad Spectrum for Face, 1 Ounce
product_meta.description: An ultra-light, oil-free sun protection lotion for the face that controls excess sebum and gives skin a matte appearance while guarding against daily environmental aggressors. Promotes the natural beauty of skin.
feature_bullets: An ultra-light, oil-free sun protection lotion
Gives skin a matte appearance while guarding against daily environmental aggressors
Promotes the natural beauty of skin
